content: free pattern this is an overlay mosaic crochet pattern graphs only and fairly minimal directions as the designs are intended to be used anyway you please repeating mix-n-match etc adding as many row between designs as you like i have some suggestions for colorways in the pattern you could even make a scarf with one of the designs i m sorry i don t have yardage on this i used mostly stash yarns i had on hand and could only speculate on how much i used have fun with it and share what you make
